A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
This movie reset the entire Star Wars saga back to the rebellion. No growth\, no progression\, no creativity\, no risks taken or sh*ts given. I never thought I would say this but I miss you George.

They took a big dump all over LUKE and his journey to become and restore the Jedi.

Way too long (never thought I'd say that as a Star Wars fan) too slow\, and the slowest\, dumbest space chase in movie history.  Since when did Star Wars start ripping off battlestar galactica???

I care nothing for these new characters and long for more R2-D2 over BB-Jar Jar.

Oh\, and since when can chicken walkers (AT-ST) sprint????

Doubt I'll be seeing episode 9 since I don't see the point of continuing to watch a story that's already been told. 

"The rebellion reborn" - Luke Skywalker WTF Rian Johnson?!?!  WTF Disney?!?!?!
